title: Beautiful Condo Available 3bed/2bath in Philadelphia!
description: So much space in this large 2-story brownstone bi-level condominium with your own private courtyard for entertaining! On a tree-lined, cobblestone street within a block of the Spring Gardens and the Roberto Clemente Playground, you will find this 3bd, 2ba home in one of the most picturesque neighborhoods in Philadelphia! Walk in the door and you will notice the high ceilings, and the sunlight streaming onto the hardwood floors from the large, floor-to-ceiling windows. You have plenty of space on this main floor that houses a living room, dining area and open space kitchen with modern appliances. Down the hall is the bedroom suite, which consists of the primary bedroom, bathroom with custom shower, designer walk-in closet, and laundry nook with full-size washer and dryer. Walk through the primary bedroom is a small  balcony that has stairs down to the private courtyard and garden. But that’s not all!  Travel down to the recently renovated lower level with an extra large Great Room, housing a fitness area, media lounge and bar area where you can walk out and sit on your own outdoor couches in a private oasis! Down the hall from the great room are two more bedrooms (one currently an office) and another full bathroom should you choose to have a roommate or guests stay over. This beautiful brick home is near the Spring Gardens, an urban community garden built by neighbors that helps families grow food and flowers for themselves. Walkable to Whole Foods, the Masterman School, the Rodin Museum, Art Museum, Schuylkill River and Fairmount park, this is the perfect location within a short distance of the City’s best restaurants, museums, and nightlife.  PROVIDE YOUR NUMBER SO THAT WE CAN CONTACT YOU FOR ADDITIONAL INFORMATION.

Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. title: Filled with shimmering natural light, Historic Farmhouse*waterfront
description:
The two-bedroom Smokehouse apartment is one of two executive apartments that we offer at LilyField Farm, a 300-year-old historic farmstead featuring unique, furnished accommodations in a country setting. Short-term and long-term leases available. We breathe new life into vintage buildings by restoring them into beautiful living spaces -- for you.
This is ideal for executive relocation, corporate housing needs, internships, students, traveling nurses, health-care and other professionals, and term-contract employees, Short term and year-to-year options are available.
LilyField is a working Pennsylvania farmstead nestled on a hillside overlooking a lake. It's a tranquil place where blue herons glide just above the water, and turtles sunbathe to a chorus of bullfrogs. The pastures are animated by chickens, ducks, goats, and our two potbellied pigs stretched out under the apple trees for their afternoon nap amid a glory of over 250 varieties of daylilies and other blossoms.
-- Smokehouse includes utilities package: electric, wi-fi, water, sewer, heating, air conditioning, trash removal, and more.
-- Pets are welcome; monthly fee per pet.
-- First month's rent, last month's rent and security deposit.
-- Smokehouse will have a regular cleaning service for a monthly fee.
-- Please map location to be sure it is convenient for your work and lifestyle.
***We are located in the township of Worcester, about midway between Collegeville and Skippack.
-- Prices, amenities, and availability are subject to change without notice.
Take a look! You quickly will see why we love living at LilyField Farm - and why you might, too. Don't let this delightful opportunity slip away. We look forward to talking with you soon.

title: Lovely Upper Darby 3BR
description: After 60 memory-making years, the time has come to pass along the keys to this single-family home situated on an amazing street with a peaceful backyard setting to relax, play, grill, garden or tinker around in the detached 2-car garage with its own private driveway.   First Floor Details:  High ceilings, hardwood floors (under the carpets), split staircase, and circular flow.  A large, sunfilled living room with additional space by the front door offers the flexibility to use this space in a variety of ways that fit your needs. The formal dining room is big in scale with 3 large windows to set the tone and offers the perfect place for all your important meals.  The sunfilled kitchen offers an additional dining area plus a place to meal prep and cook!  Gas stove, dishwasher, refrigerator, ample cabinets, and storage areas are some of the highlights plus you will find access to the backyard and basement.  Second Floor Details: Hardwood floors (Under the carpets) 3 great-sized bedrooms with closets complete with hall bath.  Third Floor:  Amazing space just waiting to be renovated.  Basement:  Flexible space for office/den/playroom just waiting to be renovated as well as a separate workshop complete with laundry room, toilet, mechanical area and access to the back yard.

title: Extra Large 2 Bedroom Condo in Washington Sq West
description:
Along the border of vibrant Bella Vista and idyllic Washington Sq West, you'll find 920 South St #4. This 1,300 sqft condo has two beds, two baths, a balcony, private basement storage, and in-unit laundry. Beautiful hardwood floors and tall ceilings frame the open and airy main living space.
The living room is filled with natural light from an expansive window and a pair of sliding doors that lead to the balcony. The dining area can easily accommodate a table for +6. The modern kitchen is fitted with inset cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, a tile backsplash, granite counters, and a peninsula with seating.
Down the hall, there's a spacious secondary bedroom and a full bathroom. Completing the unit is a large, bright primary bedroom suite with a walk-in closet and an attached full bathroom. Other highlights include STORAGE ROOM keyless entry, speakers wired throughout, and a video security system.
In addition to everything inside, 920 South St's location offers the best of city living with a Walk Score of 99! Top-rated restaurants, friendly cafes, popular markets, and local shops are all just steps away. It's also close to multiple parks, playgrounds, and dog runs. Plus, there's easy access to Jefferson and Pennsylvania hospitals, public transit, I-95, and South Jersey. Schedule your in-person or virtual tour today!
Parking available for an extra monthly fee.
Listing provided by OCF Realty

description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient.
